response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $15,000. Considering its worth and the potential it has to significantly benefit you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while also maximizing my earnings. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and interests.", "product_price": 12000}
